overview.en: PolkaBridge (PBR) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. PolkaBridge has a current supply of 99,996,110.08989319 with 31,996,110.0898932 in circulation. The last known price of PolkaBridge is 0.24716659 USD and is up 4.72 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 5 active market(s) with $1,062,894.54 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://polkabridge.org/.
